title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 594.3 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 594.3 - Applicability

State Regulations
(a) This Part
applies to the operation or proposed operation of a licensed housing program, including teaching family home, crisis residence, and community residence
programs, including Community Residence for Eating Disorder Integrated

Treatment (CREDIT) programs, for children and adolescents licensed pursuant to
article 31 of the Mental Hygiene Law. (b) This Part applies to the operation or
proposed operation of a State-operated licensed housing program for children
and adolescents. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
594.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
